meanings.sent1: The loud music played overwhelmingly in the small room.
meanings.sent2: She felt overwhelmingly tired after running a marathon.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's cuteness was overwhelmingly adorable.
meanings.sent4: The storm raged overwhelmingly, shaking the windows.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood overwhelmingly tall against the sky.

meanings.definition: To a very great degree or with great intensity
meanings.sent1: The students overwhelmingly supported the new school policy.
meanings.sent2: The team overwhelmingly won the championship game.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream shop overwhelmingly sold out of their new flavor.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness overwhelmingly touched everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset were overwhelmingly beautiful.
